quote: I have two friends, Steve and Martin. But I'd happily replace both for the friendship of Steve Martin.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: History, Stephen said, is a nightmare from which I am trying to awake.
author: James Joyce,  Ulysses

quote: Merlin’s beard.
author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quote: I pull a lot of the stuff that I play off the rhythm tracks - and Keith Richards has been one of the main contributors to my inspirational playing.
author: Bobby Keys

quote: Michael Pollan is a champion. In all ways. A man of great integrity, humor, and common sense and kindness.
author: Maira Kalman

quote: what would you call this haircut?"arthur.
author: George Harrison

quote: Sir,’ said Stephen, ‘I read novels with the utmost pertinacity. I look upon them--I look upon good novels--as a very valuable part of literature, conveying more exact and finely-distinguished knowledge of the human heart and mind than almost any other, with greater breadth and depth and fewer constraints.
author: Patrick O'Brian,  The Nutmeg of Consolation

quote: It's a special person - and personality - who can lead a start-up to soaring success and sustain that success for the long term. Apple co-founder Steve Jobs and Facebook's Mark Zuckerberg are star examples.
author: Marcus Buckingham

quote: Jon Stewart, Bill Maher, Stephen Colbert. Those are the guys I look at who are telling me pretty much the truth. And they throw humor into it which makes it much more interesting to listen to.
author: Grace Slick

quote: Stephen King has inspired me with his humor and honesty, and his admonition that the author's job is to tell the truth.
author: Barry Eisler

quote: I could name my penis Steve, and it would be appropriate, as it is sort of shaped like my dad’s face, whose name is Steve. Not just his face, but his whole body and person is named Steve. And he’s a dick.
author: Jarod Kintz,  A Story That Talks about Talking Is Like Chatter to Chattering Teeth, and Every Set of Dentures Can Attest to the Fact That No..

quote: Francois Rabelais. He was a poet. And his last words were "I go to seek a Great Perhaps."That's why I'm going. So I don't have to wait until I die to start seeking a Great Perhaps.
author: John Green,  Looking for Alaska

quote: I am a man, and men do not drink pink drinks. Now, be gone, woman, and fetch me something brown."Jace said. "Brown?"said Isabelle."Yes. Brown. It's a manly color. See? Alec is wearing it."Jace said."Well, it was black but it faded."Alec said."Well, I can always fix it up with something sparkly,"Magnus said, holding a sparkley headband. "Resist the urge, Alec, resist the urge."Simon said.
author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Glass

quote: I admired Stephen Daldry very much; I think he's a brilliant director, and also, I feel close to him because he has a lot of theater behind him. He's also a man of great imagination and a lovely sense of humor.
author: Max von Sydow

quote: When his writing is going well, Gordon Strangle Mars likes to wake up at 6 a.m. and go out driving. He works out new plot lines about giant spiders and keeps an eye out for abandoned couches, which he wrestles into the back of his pickup truck. Then he writes for the rest of the day.
author: Kelly Link,  Pretty Monsters: Stories

quote: Shane looked…pale. Pale and shaken and—how predictable was this?—pissed.
author: Rachel Caine

quote: All killer whales are named Kevin. You knew that, right?
author: Christopher Moore,  Fluke: Or, I Know Why the Winged Whale Sings

quote: George Carlin is brilliant with words, and Johnny Winters is very creative. It's taking something common and drawing out the humor, being clever with words.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: What? Quinn's one of them? I just thought he was an a*shole!
author: Simon Holt,  The Devouring

quote: See?"she heard Shane yell at the kitchen. "She doesn't stomp around like a cattle stampede!""Bite me, Collins! No bacon for you, either!
author: Rachel Caine,  Ghost Town

quote: William Hurt has a painful last name. Kevin Love has a name perfect for February 14th. But what about Johnny Longdong? Where does he fit?
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: I refuse to believe that Hendrix had the last possessed hand,that Joplin had the last drunken throat,that Morrison had the last enlightened mind.
author: Patti Smith

quote: I'm a Larry David fan, right? And it seems to me that Jewish history from the Talmud on has been a self-deprecating, self-critical kind of humor.
author: Peter Eisenman

quote: Jerry Seinfeld is amazing in many ways, not the least of them his ability to find humor, and convincing us to find it, too, in the million-and-two details about modern life that under different circumstances might send us into paroxysms of rage.
author: Tom Shales

quote: Jeffrey Zeldman had an astonishing ability to craft a seductive coolness using educated references, dry humor, and retro/organic imagery.
author: Matt Mullenweg

quote: [at CMC West Coast 2011, on 1 Samuel 14] If just a few of you would step up and be like Jonathan ... as you step out in faith, you know what's going to happen? There'll be people like Saul who'll say, "God's doing something through that guy, God's doing something through that girl. I want to be a part of that.
author: Francis Chan

quote: His name is Randy Randy. Or maybe it’s Randy Randy. I always get his first and last names mixed up.
author: Jarod Kintz,  $3.33

quote: A philosophy professor at my college, whose baby became enamored of the portrait of David Hume on a Penguin paperback, had the cover laminated in plastic so her daughter could cut her teeth on the great thinker.
author: Anne Fadiman,  Ex Libris: Confessions of a Common Reader

quote: David Dukes How come everytime I put on the T.V.to watch some Dick Wolf crime show,all the judges are blackand all the criminals are white!I just sayin there must be some kindaJew conspiracy at work here!
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Vampires. They wrote the book on possessive.
author: Charlaine Harris,  Dead to the World

quote: I genuinely liked all of the cast members very much. Steve had a wicked sense of humor. I remember Russell coming to my rescue, once. I watched Eric evolve before everyone's eyes. Maurice loved what he did, so. He treated his character with respect, down to the costuming.
author: Madeleine Stowe

quote: I always felt that Jim Morrison was a terrible name for the front man of The Doors. No, for a band called The Doors, a name like Rusty Hinge would have been more appropriate.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This is the story my great-grandfather told my father, who then told my grandfather, who then told me about how The Mythical Mr. Boo, Charles Manseur Fizzlebush Grissham III, better known as Mr. Fizzlebush, and Orafoura are all in fact me...

quote: And I loved Fats Waller. I love his instrumental abilities, his vocal abilities and his sense of humor.
author: Paul McCartney

quote: Edward Norton and I have known each other awhile. I just think he's the real deal, supremely talented and smart. He's got a great sense of humor.
author: Kevin Spacey

quote: Denzel Washington has a great sense of humor. He did all those 'Nutty Professor' movies.
author: Seth MacFarlane

quote: Kevin Love has a last name that sums up my feelings for you. But then again, so does Renaldo Letsfucktonight.
author: Jarod Kintz,  The Titanic would never have sunk if it were made out of a sink.

quote: Have you made any other friends since we've been here?"I gave him the death stare. "Yes, actually.""Who? I want a name.""Jamie Roth.""The Ebola kid? I heard he's a little unstable.""That was one incident.
author: Michelle Hodkin,  The Unbecoming of Mara Dyer

quote: I'll let you in on a secret: I can't stand Jay Ward. I hate being compared to Rocky and Bullwinkle. It's just a different style of humor.
author: John Kricfalusi

quote: What in the blue star-blazes did you see in Jason?"he asked, still forcefully but with his frustration and jealousy under better control."For one thing, Djetth, he wasn't trying to kill me!"("Marsh", heroine of Insufficient Mating Material)
author: Rowena Cherry,  Insufficient Mating Material

quote: Rock Hudson wasn't my type. He's a great guy and had a great sense of humor.
author: Tab Hunter

quote: Robert Walker as Bruno was excellent. He had elegance and humor, and the proper fondness for his mother.
author: Patricia Highsmith

quote: That man is a success who has lived well, laughed often and loved much.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Stephen kissed me in the spring,Robin in the fall,But Colin only looked at meAnd never kissed at all.Stephen’s kiss was lost in jest,Robin’s lost in play,But the kiss in Colin’s eyesHaunts me night and day.
author: Sara Teasdale,  The Collected Poems

quote: A genius. A criminal mastermind. A millionaire. And he is only twelve years old.
author: Eoin Colfer,  Artemis Fowl

quote: I don't think we get a choice in who we fall for,"Ian whispers. "I think we just do.
author: Jodi Picoult,  Keeping Faith

quote: I would probably work with Drake as he is massively inspirational to me as a writer as well as an artist. If not him, then Susan Boyle!
author: Conor Maynard

quote: You put me through hell. On purpose. Made me suffer. And there’s no end in sight. I don’t know what the fuck you’re doing, ace, but this Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde shit ain’t cutting it with me.
author: Sylvia Day,  Reflected in You

quote: I'm very fond of the British cinema. I'm a big fan of Martin Campbell and Daniel Craig. I actually find Daniel very inspirational, especially on the physical side of things. He really inspired me to get back into shape when I started to add on a few pounds. I think he's a great role model.
author: Steven Bauer

quote: Musically, he was like an old man in a boy's skin.
author: Eric Clapton

quote: [Ranger] "How's your mental health?"he asked. "I heard about Soder."[Stephanie] "I'm rattled.""I have a cure."Oh, boy.He put the truck in gear and headed for the exit. "I know what you're thinking,"he said. "And that wasn't where I was going. I was going to suggest work.""I knew that."He looked over at me and grinned. "You want me bad."I did. God help me.
author: Janet Evanovich
